mapper.select: select GOODS_CODE, GOODS_NAME, COMPANY, PRICE, CATEGORY, THUMB_IMAGE, DETAIL_IMAGE, WEIGHT, UNIT, ALLERGY, CALORIE, NA, CARBO, SUGAR, SFAT, PROTEIN from goods where goods_code = #{gcode}

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( select * from goods
goods_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by 1 ) a ) b
WHERE b.rn > (#{page}-1)*12 AND b.rn <= #{page}*12
